mapper.sql: apply_id, apply_content, car_id, user_id, apply_time, ready_time, apply_state, apply_comment
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,g.car_name,u.real_name,r.rep_name FROM `user_apply` a LEFT JOIN car_goods g ON g.car_id = a.car_id LEFT JOIN buyer_user u ON u.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN car_repository r ON r.rep_id = a.apply_content where a.apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into user_apply (apply_id, apply_content, car_id, user_id, apply_time, ready_time, apply_state, apply_comment) values (#{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{readyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into user_apply
apply_id,
apply_content,
car_id,
user_id,
apply_time,
ready_time,
apply_state,
apply_comment,

mapper.update:
update user_apply
apply_content = #{applyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ready_time = #{readyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_state = #{applyState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
apply_comment = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_apply set apply_content = #{applyContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_id = #{carId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ready_time = #{readyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, apply_state = #{applyState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_comment = #{applyComment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where apply_id = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,g.car_name,u.real_name,r.rep_name FROM `user_apply` a LEFT JOIN car_goods g ON g.car_id = a.car_id LEFT JOIN buyer_user u ON u.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN car_repository r ON r.rep_id = a.apply_content ORDER BY a.ready_time desc

SELECT a.*,g.car_name,u.real_name,r.rep_name FROM `user_apply` a LEFT JOIN car_goods g ON g.car_id = a.car_id LEFT JOIN buyer_user u ON u.user_id = a.user_id LEFT JOIN car_repository r ON r.rep_id = a.apply_content where a.user_id = ${userId} ORDER BY a.ready_time desc
